alert.note: Alert for Bath; Fleming; Rowan (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 16 at 2:28PM EDT until May 16 at 3:15PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in JACKSON KY has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Bath County in east central Kentucky... South central Fleming County in east central Kentucky... Southwestern Rowan County in east central Kentucky... * Until 315 PM EDT. * At 228 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Owingsville, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Bourbon Furnace around 235 PM EDT. Peasticks around 240 PM EDT. Marshall around 245 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Salt Lick, Midland and Farmers. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
